alert.note: Alert for Liberty (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 11 at 3:15PM MDT until April 16 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of north central Montana, including the following counties, Blaine, Chouteau, Hill and Liberty. * WHEN...Until 600 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 313 PM MDT, Emergency management reported flooding in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Havre, Chinook, Chester, Big Sandy, Harlem, Beaver Creek, Azure, Sangrey, Agency, Boneau, Parker School, St. Pierre, Box Elder, Gildford, Inverness, Fort Belknap, Joplin, Hays, Turner and Lothair. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
